item.title: How do regional price levels affect income inequality? Household-level evidence from countries worldwide
item.description: Šedivý, M., & Janský, P. (2024). How do regional price levels affect income inequality? Household-level evidence from countries worldwide. Forthcoming in The Annals of Regional Science.

item.title: Mortality shocks and household consumption: the case of Mexico
item.description: Šedivý, M. (2023). Mortality shocks and household consumption: the case of Mexico. Review of Economics of the Household, 21(4), 1289-1358.

item.title: How Many of Us Can Work from Home? Evidence for the Czech Republic

item.title: Estimating the revenue costs of tax treaties in developing countries
